name: farrukkh.com
body: # **FARRUKKH SHEIKKH** ### CREATIVE UI UX DESIGNER & DEVELOPER I work as Creative Designer, Animator, and Non Linear Editor, Joined AP Entertainment UK based Production Company in 2006 and delivered over 10 infotainment & music projects for private TV Channels. ## SPECIALIZATION: PowerPoint, HTML, CSS/CSS3, jQuery, Photoshop, Asp, PHP, IIS, Drupal , Domain & Hosting Management, Project Management, Strategic Planning, Conceptual Planning, Strategic communications, Troubleshooting. ## SERVICES: ### Web Design & Development For any kind of business to succeed, it simply has to have a commanding Website presence. I execute all the right tools to deliver a visually appealing and functional Website. ### Internet Marketing Whether you want to attract more people to your business website, or expand your target audience, or just spread the word about your new brand online, Sheikkh does it all. ### Social Media Build your marketing with your favorite social media - share, publish, let your visits spread the word. ## CONTACT: Ready to rule the web? Letâ€™s show you some recent work and answer any questions you have about services. drop an email
